bring the tylenol: Move to the drawer, open the yellow drawer, take out the medicine bottle, place it into the basket, close the drawer, and return to the initial starting position.
bring vitamin: Move to the drawer, pick the vitamin bottle on the drawer, place it into the basket, and return to the starting point.
bring pencil: Move to the drawer, pick the pink pen, place it into the basket, and return to the starting point.
